name: stranded (itch) (jlothamer)
description:
This is a game for Linux Game Jam 2022.  It's sort of a first person adventure game in space.

Controls are standard fps:  wasd/arrows to move, mouse to look, return/e to interact.

You can choose to invert mouse y or not (default not).  And you can change the mouse sensativity.  The game saves your choices.

To play, download the zip file for your operating system and unzip the file.  And then just run the executable.
